mapper.sql: Sqd_ProdID, Sqd_SerNO, Sqd_ProdName, Sqd_ProdSize, Sqd_UnitName, Sqd_sQuantity, Sqd_ZkqPrice, Sqd_Discount, Sqd_UnitPrice, Sqd_Price, Sqd_TaxRate, Sqd_Taxlimit, Sqd_TaxInclusivePrice, Sqd_Complimentart, Sqd_ItemRemark, sql_id, Sqd_auditing, Sqd_yn, Sqd_custom1, Sqd_custom2, Sqd_custom3, Sqd_custom4, Sqd_custom5, Sqd_custom6
mapper.select:
select
from sales_quotation_details where sqd_Yn=0 ORDER BY sqd_Prodid DESC
mapper.insert: insert into sales_quotation_details (Sqd_ProdID, Sqd_SerNO, Sqd_ProdName, Sqd_ProdSize, Sqd_UnitName, Sqd_sQuantity, Sqd_ZkqPrice, Sqd_Discount, Sqd_UnitPrice, Sqd_Price, Sqd_TaxRate, Sqd_Taxlimit, Sqd_TaxInclusivePrice, Sqd_Complimentart, Sqd_ItemRemark, sql_id, Sqd_auditing, Sqd_yn, Sqd_custom1, Sqd_custom2, Sqd_custom3, Sqd_custom4, Sqd_custom5, Sqd_custom6 ) values (#{sqdProdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqdSerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqdProdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqdProdsize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqdUnitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqdSquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sqdZkqprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sqdDiscount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sqdUnitprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sqdPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sqdTaxrate,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sqdTaxlimit,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sqdTaxinclusiveprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sqdComplimentart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sqdItemremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqdAuditing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqdCustom1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqdCustom2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqdCustom3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqdCustom4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqdCustom5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sqdCustom6,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update sales_quotation_details
Sqd_SerNO = #{sqdSerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Sqd_ProdName = #{sqdProdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Sqd_ProdSize = #{sqdProdsize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Sqd_UnitName = #{sqdUnitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Sqd_sQuantity = #{sqdSquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Sqd_ZkqPrice = #{sqdZkqprice,jdbcType=REAL},
Sqd_Discount = #{sqdDiscount,jdbcType=REAL},
Sqd_UnitPrice = #{sqdUnitprice,jdbcType=REAL},
Sqd_Price = #{sqdPrice,jdbcType=REAL},
Sqd_TaxRate = #{sqdTaxrate,jdbcType=REAL},
Sqd_Taxlimit = #{sqdTaxlimit,jdbcType=REAL},
Sqd_TaxInclusivePrice = #{sqdTaxinclusiveprice,jdbcType=REAL},
Sqd_Complimentart = #{sqdComplimentart,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Sqd_ItemRemark = #{sqdItemremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sql_id = #{sqlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Sqd_auditing = #{sqdAuditing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Sqd_yn = #{sqdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Sqd_custom1 = #{sqdCustom1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Sqd_custom2 = #{sqdCustom2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Sqd_custom3 = #{sqdCustom3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Sqd_custom4 = #{sqdCustom4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Sqd_custom5 = #{sqdCustom5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Sqd_custom6 = #{sqdCustom6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where Sqd_ProdID = #{sqdProdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sales_quotation_details set Sqd_SerNO = #{sqdSerno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sqd_ProdName = #{sqdProdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sqd_ProdSize = #{sqdProdsize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sqd_UnitName = #{sqdUnitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sqd_sQuantity = #{sqdSquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Sqd_ZkqPrice = #{sqdZkqprice,jdbcType=REAL}, Sqd_Discount = #{sqdDiscount,jdbcType=REAL}, Sqd_UnitPrice = #{sqdUnitprice,jdbcType=REAL}, Sqd_Price = #{sqdPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, Sqd_TaxRate = #{sqdTaxrate,jdbcType=REAL}, Sqd_Taxlimit = #{sqdTaxlimit,jdbcType=REAL}, Sqd_TaxInclusivePrice = #{sqdTaxinclusiveprice,jdbcType=REAL}, Sqd_Complimentart = #{sqdComplimentart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Sqd_ItemRemark = #{sqdItemremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sql_id = #{sqlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sqd_auditing = #{sqdAuditing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sqd_yn = #{sqdYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sqd_custom1 = #{sqdCustom1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sqd_custom2 = #{sqdCustom2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sqd_custom3 = #{sqdCustom3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sqd_custom4 = #{sqdCustom4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sqd_custom5 = #{sqdCustom5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sqd_custom6 = #{sqdCustom6,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Sqd_ProdID = #{sqdProdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
